Screenwriter: Amy Holden Jones, Amy Holden Jones, Perry Howze, Randy Howze, Alfred Uhry
Synopsis: "Mystic Pizza" charts the lives and loves of three unforgettable waitresses in a little town called Mystic. For sexy Daisy Araujo (Julia Roberts), her sensible sister Kat (Annabeth Gish) and their wisecracking friend Jojo (Lili Taylor), the summer after high school is a summer they'll never forget. Slinging pizza at a local restaurant, the three girls share their hopes, dreams and plans for escaping their small town.
Title: Mystic Pizza
